attributes.action: put pressure on the EU to prevent Turkey's membership of the EU until its social care provision satisifies international standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undercover visit by the Dutchess of York to children's homes in Turkey revealed horrific treatment of children, including tying them up, denying them access to air and daylight and other significant violations of human rights. We believe that it would be grossly irresponsible for the UK to support the admission to the EU of a country where this is routine practice.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/banturkey/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
